Create Year Range Strings

Source: R/wp_data.r
in_create_year_ranges.Rd

Internal helper function that creates compact string representations of year ranges.

Used by: in_check_missing_data Uses: None

Features:

  • Range compression

  • Efficient string creation

  • Century handling

  • Single year handling

Usage

in_create_year_ranges(years_with_data, all_years)

Arguments

years_with_data

numeric; vector of years with data

all_years

numeric; vector of all possible years

Value

character string of year ranges
